plurals.name: num_pending
plurals.comment: Used for pending loves, pending scrobbles

string.name: parse_error
string.comment: Title parsing error for Youtube etc

string.name: scrobble_ignored
string.comment: Will be prefixed by Lastfm: (e.g. Lastfm: Scrobble ignored)

resources.string: Lastfm tidak boleh edit disebabkan scrobble yang sudah lama. Adakah anda mahu menyimpan edit ini untuk scrobble yang akan datang?

string.name: top_artists
string.comment: Top artists the user has listened to

string.name: top_albums
string.comment: top albums the user has listened to, or most scrobbled albums of an artist

string.name: top_tracks
string.comment: top tracks the user has listened to, or most scrobbled tracks of an artist

string.name: other_apps
string.comment: Apps which are not music players or video streaming apps

string.name: apps
string.comment: Currently appears on the regex edit dialog showing the selected apps and allowing the user to add more apps

resources.string: Tiada internet. Data yang ditunjuk adalah lama
Buka URL ini di pelayar peranti lain

string.name: scrobble_services
string.comment: Services like lastfm, librefm, listenbrainz etc

string.name: recents_share
string.comment: %1= artist — track, %2= relative time (with preposition e.g. on Sep 9)

string.name: recents_share_username
string.comment: %1= artist — track, %2= relative time (with preposition e.g. on Sep 9), %3= username

string.name: legend
string.comment: Chart legend - descriptions of the symbols used

string.name: do_index
string.comment: downloads the top scrobbles and indexes them into a database

resources.string: Ini mungkin mengambil masa yang lama
Guna ini jika anda sudah edit atau buang scrobble dari laman web.

string.name: searched_n_items
string.comment: %1= number of tracks/albums/artists, always greater than 1000

string.name: item_options
string.comment: Screen reader text for 3 dots menu button

string.name: new_player
string.comment: (%1 = App name) detected (shown in notification, when a new music player is detected)

resources.string: Pergi ketetapan untuk mula scrobble aplikasi ini
Fail telah ada. Klik semula untuk tulis semula.

string.name: unhate
string.comment: Undo a hate/dislike and make it neutral. This is not the same as Like

string.name: unlove
string.comment: Undo a love/like and make it neutral. This is not the same as Dislike

string.name: following
string.comment: accounts you are following on lastfm

resources.string: Diperlukan untuk menjejak metadata muzik. Notifikasi selain ini tidak diakses

string.name: send_notifications_desc
string.comment: Shown before asking for notification permission on Android 13+

resources.string: - Periksa status dan kiraan scrobble - Suka atau blok terus dari notifikasi - Mempamer scrobble terbanyak setiap minggu - Dan banyak lagi - Tiada bunyi notifikasi
Langkau pilihan ini akan menyebabkan masalah scrobble

string.name: charts
string.comment: User\'s top artists, albums, tracks, line chart of daily scrobble counts and tag cloud

string.name: time_jump
string.comment: Button shows scrobbles from a specific time

string.name: years
string.comment: For the charts menu which displays year by year

string.name: listening_activity
string.comment: Shows a bar chart of the number of scrobbles each day/week/month/year

string.name: charts_custom
string.comment: Custom date range, but in short, used in the charts menu

string.name: charts_continuous
string.comment: Continuous date ranges, but in short, like last 7 days, last 30 days, etc

string.name: not_enough_data
string.comment: (not enough data to draw a chart etc)

string.name: random
string.comment: Displays a random scrobble or a loved track of the user

string.name: close
string.comment: To close a dialog or something

string.name: quit
string.comment: A stronger word than close, used to completely quit the app and stop scrobbling on desktop

string.name: edit_extract
string.comment: To extract sub text from a larger text, in short, used in pattern edits

string.name: edit_extract_desc
string.comment: Do not translate artist, albumArtist, album, track, because the user has to enter them as it is. https://www.google.com/search?q=regex+named+capture+groups

resources.string: Namakan kumpulan berdasarkan lagu, album, artis atau albumArtis untuk ekstrak dari tempat lain

string.name: edit_extract_example
string.comment: Do not translate artist, albumArtist, album, track, because the user has to enter them as it is. https://www.google.com/search?q=regex+named+capture+groups

resources.string: Untuk tukar artis dan tajuk, masukkan kod artis (?<track>.*) dan kod lagu (?<artist>.*)

string.name: edit_extract_no_groups
string.comment: Do not translate artist, albumArtist, album, track, because the user has to enter them as it is. https://www.google.com/search?q=regex+named+capture+groups

resources.string: Sekurangnya kod anda patut ada nama berikut: \"lagu\", \"artis\"

string.name: edit_extract_extra_groups
string.comment: %1= the name of the capture group https://www.google.com/search?q=regex+named+capture+groups

resources.string: Dalam kod anda, tidak dibenarkan mempunyai lebih dari \"%1$s\" ini

string.name: edit_regex_rules_matched
string.comment: the specific regex patterns that were used

resources.string: Jika ada, teruskan guna paparan kod yang bersesuaian

string.name: edit_drag_handle
string.comment: screen reader text for drag and drop button

string.name: edit_regex_warning
string.comment: shown before adding a custom pattern edit

resources.string: Pastikan anda memahami kod java sebelum menggunakan ini, atau gunakan satu daripra-tetapyang diberikan. Kod yang bersesuaian disediakan dari atas bawah
Penuhan lebih dari bidang ini akan ditetapkan DAN pengendali antara mereka

string.name: blocked_metadata_noti
string.comment: to block and skip a track from scrobbling and playing

string.name: player_actions
string.comment: music player actions such as skip/mute

string.name: do_nothing
string.comment: do nothing on the media player

string.name: hidden_tags
string.comment: Tags that should not be shown to the user

string.name: pin
string.comment: pin a friend to the top

string.name: unpin
string.comment: unpin a friend to the top

resources.string: Adakah anda mahu menyunting pola atur: %1$s?
Ini boleh membuatkan scrobbler terus aktif untuk peranti tertentu

string.name: analysis
string.comment: musical analysis such as key, bpm, time signature, dancability etc

string.name: captions
string.comment: Collage image captions such as artist names, play counts

resources.string: Scrobble ketika tiada internet & kesukaan akan disimpan, dan dihantar selepas itu.
Aplikasi sokongan yang menunjukkan metadata muzik. Untuk mengelakkan bertindih scrobble dari Spotify, pilih satu sahaja.

string.name: pref_spotify_artist_search_approximate
string.comment: This feature actually grabs the first result from Spotify artist search regardless of what that result is

resources.string: Guna gambar yang tepat ketika mencari gambar artis
Tekan butang \'hati\' pada notifikasi untuk menyukainya di pemain media
Nyahaktif scrobble berterusan dari mikrofon apabila peranti memainkan muzik

string.name: listenbrainz_info
string.comment: %1 = the link to page containing the token

resources.string: Anda boleh mendapatkan token pengesahan di: %1$s
Ambil album data yang hilang dari lastFM

string.name: pref_imexport
string.comment: As in backup or restore the settings

resources.string: Simpan penetapan, edit dan senarai blok. Tidak menyimpan log masuk atas sebab keselamatan. Berguna jika selalu menukar peranti atau berkongsi dengan kawan.

string.name: pref_imexport_network
string.comment: As in backup or restore the settings over network

string.name: pref_imexport_code
string.comment: A code shown on the screen to be entered on the other device

resources.string: Untuk penggunaan jaringan, kedua-dua peranti mestilah menggunakan jaringan yang sama.

string.name: pref_personalization
string.comment: Such as themes, widgets and some appearance settings

resources.string: Tunjuk ikon dari aplikasi yang anda scrobble

string.name: pref_show_scrobble_sources_desc
string.comment: This is a continuation of the string: Show icons of apps you scrobbled from

resources.string: ...antara setiap scrobble. Data ini akan disimpan di peranti anda
Cari & main dari aplikasi yang anda scrobble

string.name: pref_search_in_source_desc
string.comment: This is a continuation of the string: Search & play on the app you scrobbled from

string.name: pref_lists
string.comment: Such as edits list and block lists

string.name: pref_search_url_template_desc
string.comment: Do not translate $query as the user has to enter it as it is

resources.string: Itu bukan fail eksport Pano Scrobbler
Jangan import edit dan senarai blok
Tukar semua edit dan senarai blok
Gabung, tukar edit dan senarai blok sedia ada
Gabung, simpan edit dan senarai blok sedia ada
Anda perlu disahkan untuk edit atau padam scrobble

string.name: like_instance
string.comment: %1= the scrobbling service name, such as last.fm, ListenBrainz

string.name: check_nls
string.comment: %1= the name Pano Scrobbler. Asks the user to check the app in notification access settings

resources.string: Untuk pelayan, periksa dokumen yang berkaitan.

string.name: add_photo
string.comment: Add or change a photo for the artist or album

string.name: from_gallery
string.comment: Pick an image for the artist or album from the device gallery

resources.string: Guna gambar berbentuk petak untuk hasil terbaik

string.name: borders
string.comment: Borders between images in the generated collage

string.name: retry
string.comment: Retry loading data from network after it has failed

resources.string: Sila gunakan pelayar di peranti yang sesuai untuk menggunakan ini.

string.name: save_logs
string.comment: Debug logs to be saved to a text file

string.name: contrast
string.comment: Color contrast, used in the themes screen

string.name: needs_plugin
string.comment: Used for some desktop media players

resources.string: Kawal Pano Scrobbler dari aplikasi yang sesuai
Cara ini adalah untuk pengguna hebat seperti anda untuk terus menyokong jangkahayat aplikasi ini.
Anda juga bakal menikmati ciri-ciri istimewa seperti:
Pembelian anda masih lagi belum disahkan. Sila tunggu sebentar.

Sudah membuat pembayaran?
Pembelian anda diuruskan oleh Google Play. Pembelian ini akan dipautkan dengan akaun anda. Bila anda memuat turun aplikasi ini diperanti yang lain, Google Play akan menyalahtafsirkan sebagai akaun palsu. Untuk mengelakkan masalah ini, sila muat turun aplikasi ini dari pelayar web Google Play:
- Padam aplikasi ini. - Buka pelayar web Google Play dari komputer. - Log masuk akaun pembeli. - Muat turun dari pelayar web.
Blok artis/lagu dan auto langkau ataupun tutup audio

string.name: billing_pin_friends
string.comment: %1= number of pins, always 10 or more

resources.string: Ingat aplikasi yang di-scrobble dan terus membuat carian di situ
Tulis aturan ekstrak metada menggunakan kod
Kod ini telahpun digunakan (%1$d) peranti semaksima.
